Articles.Content:
I wave a giant magnet over your supercomputer. (Giant magnet > EMP)

My hill with a fried supercomputer inside.

I scrapped the supercomputer debris, make a killing with the recovered precious metals, and outright BUY the deed to the hill.

My hill!

Oh look. It's the 30's and the Great Depression.

Your hill is worth nothing. You die of a panic stricken heart attack.

I then firmly plant a flag on it.

My Hill.

oh look it is now the 40's, I assassinate Hitler take the third Reich for my own, Stopping the Holocaust before it even begun. With the Wehrmacht I Blitzkrieg the hill with Sturmgewerhs, MG 42s and Many Tiger 2s. Driving up the hill in my Maus, jump out and Plant my Flag. 

My Hill.

I fly past in an A-10 Warthog, lay waste to your pitiful army, and retake the Hill.

MINE! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Hi, Mr. ICBM, how was you-

MY Pile of radioactive waste and cobalt-50!

Oh look. It's 40,000 AD now.

I wipe the ancient dust-remains of the old hill claimers aside.

My hill.
I anschluss yuo. Mein Hill!

I prove the WW2 'Murican theory that lots of okay tanks is better than a few really good tanks. By building a bunch of okay tanks.

My hill swarming with tanks and their gunners posing for cameras.

But it's still 40,000 AD... Legio Invicta stomps all your tanks as only a Warlord-class Titan can. 

My hill

Unfortunately, all that stomping flattened the hill. I move to the one next door.

My hill.

I reverse time to 1914. I then Anschluss all of yuo on my way to france.

MEIN HILL!

I continue the time reversal, you become primordial ooze and slide off the hill.

Mine!

Go ahead and have your hills~ My girlfriend has two of 'em on her chest.

My perky, juicy, succulent hills.

> 
> Go ahead and have your hills~ My girlfriend has two of 'em on her chest.
> My perky, juicy, succulent hills.

I have my Schutzstaffel shoot her in the face take her to a place where you can't see her. Then i go over to a new hill that is covered in turrets and bunkers. MEIN HILL!

I cut government funding on the military, and you are forced to sell the hill & all the weapons to me for nothing.

My turret-bunker hill.

I restore my government which I wonder how you got into the Imperial German Army, but this isn't an argument thread. I then take it over with my new panzers.

Once again, MEIN HILL!

Soviet T-34/85's, IS-2's, and IS-3's overwhelm your panzers. Later, they dig in.

My socialist hill.

A giant insect eats the hill.

General Rarity's collection of dirt particles inside of a giant insect. Socialist dirt particles.

I destroy the insect with my "Panzerboys" carrying Panzerfausts. The new hill is the battle of the bulge hill! I decree a new rule! For the next 10 posts, the way you conquer the hill must pertain to WWII! MEIN HILL!

I assassinate every government official of germany, thus preventing the law from being enforced.

Nobody's hill.

I land on the hill with my Artemis spacecraft. Chris Kerman comes out and plants the good ol' stars and stripes.

'Murica's hill.

I uproot your flag and plant mine.

My hill.
I bomb your flag and place mine. I then Build A giant impenetrable dome around the hill. Try getting past that.

I place some dirt on top the dome to make a hill. Then, Chris Kerman teleports out (magix) and plants a normal KSP flag on it.

My hilldome.
